name: Otaku Den
description:
Otaku Den is a game about filling up all of the spaces in your bedroom by buying products from the store.

* 30 unique items to shop.
* Try to aim for the perfect rank: No spaces left behind + $0 money left.
* Best played in 1280px x 768px or higher (anything below will be misaligned).

Controls: Mouse

* Right click on store items to buy.
* Right click to drop items in your room.
* Right click to pick up items in your room.
